test-case.name: op-hexBinary-equal2args-1
test-case.description: Purpose: Evaluates The "op:hexBinary-equal" operator with the arguments set as follows: $value1 = xs:hexBinary(lower bound) $value2 = xs:hexBinary(lower bound)

test-case.description: Purpose: Evaluates The "op:hexBinary-equal" operator with the arguments set as follows: $value1 = xs:hexBinary(mid range) $value2 = xs:hexBinary(lower bound)
